kpi.desc: This section introduces key metrics that help you better understand the state of SaaS and subscription-based businesses.

insights.title: SaaS Key KPI Overview
insights.desc: This note explains the most important KPIs for SaaS businesses.

insights.title: MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue)
insights.desc: This note explains revenue-related metrics such as MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue), ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue), and New MRR.

insights.title: Conversion
insights.desc: This note explains KPIs related to customer acquisition (conversion).

insights.title: Churn & Retention
insights.desc: This note explains metrics related to customer churn and retention, including churn rate, customer retention rate, and Net New MRR.

insights.title: Expansion & Contraction
insights.desc: This note explains metrics related to revenue growth and reduction through customer upgrades and downgrades, such as Expansion MRR, Contraction MRR, and Net New MRR.

insights.title: Net Revenue Retention
insights.desc: This note explains efficiency-focused revenue metrics, in particular the Net Revenue Retention (NRR) rate.

insights.title: CLV (Customer Lifetime Value)
insights.desc: This note explains CLV (Customer Lifetime Value), a metric that represents the total revenue generated from a single customer.

insights.title: MRR Retention Rate
insights.desc: This note explains the MRR Retention Rate, which measures how much recurring revenue is being retained over time.

insights.title: MRR Expansion Rate
insights.desc: This note explains the MRR Expansion Rate, a metric related to revenue growth from customer upgrades.

insights.title: Net MRR Churn Rate
insights.desc: This note explains the Net MRR Churn Rate, which measures the extent of revenue loss from existing customers.

insights.title: Quick Ratio
insights.desc: This note explains the Quick Ratio, a metric used to measure the efficiency of revenue growth.

insights.title: ARPU (Average Revenue Per User)
insights.desc: This note explains ARPU (Average Revenue Per User), a metric that represents the average revenue per customer.

insights.title: Payback Period
insights.desc: This note explains the Payback Period, a metric that shows how long it takes to recover customer acquisition costs.

insights.title: Unit Economics
insights.desc: This note explains Unit Economics, a commonly used metric framework in SaaS businesses.

Trial Tour.desc: These are short hands-on sessions where you can quickly learn how to create KPIs and analyze subscription business data.

insights.title: Visualizing Business KPIs
insights.desc: This note explains how to calculate and visualize key business KPIs for subscription-based businesses using Exploratory.

insights.title: Creating Layer Cake Chart
insights.desc: This note explains how to process customer payment data and create a Layer Cake Chart to evaluate subscription business growth.

insights.title: Conversion Factor Analysis and Prediction
insights.desc: This note explains how to analyze conversion factors and build a Random Forest model to predict which prospects are likely to convert.

insights.title: Cohort Analysis
insights.desc: This note explains how to perform cohort analysis using subscription contract data to evaluate customer retention over time.

Seminar.desc: These are recordings of online seminars where you can learn analysis methods and practical insights for SaaS and subscription-based businesses.

insights.title: Cohort Analysis Part 1 - Layer Cake Chart
insights.desc: This note explains how to prepare data and create a Layer Cake chart to analyze recurring revenue growth and customer retention.

insights.title: Cohort Analysis Part 2 - Retention / Churn Analysis with Survival Curve
insights.desc: This note explains how to use survival curves to analyze customer retention and churn trends across cohorts.

insights.title: Cohort Analysis Part 3 - Customer Lifetime Value with Survival Curve
insights.desc: This note explains how to estimate Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) using survival curve data.

insights.title: Cohort Analysis Part 4 - Analyzing What Makes Churn with Prediction Models
insights.desc: This note explains how to use Cox Regression and Random Survival Models to analyze the drivers of customer churn.

insights.title: How to Create Cohort Analysis Chart to Monitor Churn & Retention
insights.desc: This note explains how to use survival curves to perform cohort analysis and monitor churn and retention more accurately.
